Design a new website for KodeCamp, taking into consideration the fact that it is an e-learning platform but should also be marketable to sponsors or partners. Deliverables: User research plan Personas User stories Information architecture.

 

 

 

Note: User low Wireframes High-fidelity designs Clickable prototype Note: You’re to design all pages, not just the home page. Use the websites below as source of inspiration.

Design a new website for KodeCamp, taking into consideration the fact that it is an e-learning platform but should also be marketable to sponsors or partners. Deliverables: User research plan Personas User stories Information architecture User low Wireframes High-fidelity designs Clickable prototype Note: You’re to design all pages, not just the home page. Use the websites below as source of inspiration.

Hello world< what is this

 

Note: User low Wireframes High-fidelity designs Clickable prototype Note: You’re to design all pages, not just the home page. Use the websites below as source of inspiration.

const handleResources =(event)=>{

        setResources(event.target.value)

    }


 

    const onFrormSubmit = (event)=> {

        event.preventDefault()

        setAddResources([...addResources, {title: resources, id: new Date()}])

        setResources('')

    }


 

    const removeResources =({id})=>{

        setAddResources(addResources.filter(item=>item.id!==id));

    }


 

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {

        e.preventDefault();

        const task = { taskTitle, taskDesc, stage, dueDate, track, points, level }


 

        setIsPending(true)


 

        fetch(`http://localhost:8000/tasks/${id}`, {

            method: 'PUT',

            headers: { 'content-Type': "application/json"},

            body: JSON.stringify(task)

        }).then ( () => {

            console.log("Task Edited");

            setIsPending(false);

            navigate('/instructor/task')

        })

    }


 

    const onDelete = () => {

        fetch(`http://localhost:8000/tasks/${task.id}`, {

            method: 'DELETE'

        }).then(() => {

            navigate('/instructor/task')

        })

    }


 

    useEffect(() => {

        setDataId(localStorage.getItem('id'))

        setTaskDesc(localStorage.getItem('taskDesc'));

        setTaskTitle(localStorage.getItem('taskTitle'));

        setStage(localStorage.getItem('stage'))

        setTrack(localStorage.getItem('track'))

        setLevel(localStorage.getItem('level'))

        setDueDate(localStorage.getItem('dueDate'))

        setPoints(localStorage.getItem('points'))

        setSubmission(localStorage.getItem('submission'))

    }, []);

Hello Status

 

Testing you has never been this much fun

Ok nh.
